commonProblems.problem: Chronic back pain or muscle tension
commonProblems.advice: Regular massage therapy can significantly reduce chronic tension. Deep tissue work targets the underlying muscle layers where tension builds up.
Massage therapy activates the parasympathetic nervous system, reducing cortisol levels and promoting relaxation. Many clients notice improved sleep within the first few sessions.
Professional facials provide deep cleansing and treatments that aren't possible at home. Regular facials every 4-6 weeks can dramatically improve skin health.
Athletes benefit from massage for faster recovery, improved flexibility, and injury prevention. We can customize pressure and focus areas based on your sport.
Couples massage is a wonderful way to share a relaxing experience together. Many couples make it a monthly ritual.
Our complimentary consultation helps us understand your needs and recommend the perfect treatment. There's no pressure - just expert guidance.

frequencyRecommendations.massage: Every 2-4 weeks for maintenance, weekly for chronic issues
frequencyRecommendations.facial: Every 4-6 weeks for optimal skin health

faqs.question: Is there parking available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have free parking available in our private lot behind the building. Street parking is also available on Oak Street.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), debit cards, cash, and digital payments like Apple Pay and Google Pay. Payment is due at the time of service.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: We require at least 24 hours notice for cancellations. Late cancellations or no-shows may be subject to a fee of 50% of the service price. We understand emergencies happen - just give us a call!

faqs.question: What happens if I'm running late?
faqs.answer: Please call us if you're running more than 10 minutes late. We'll do our best to accommodate you, but significant delays may require rescheduling to respect other clients' time.

faqs.question: What should I expect on my first visit?
faqs.answer: Please arrive 10 minutes early to complete intake paperwork. Bring a valid ID and wear comfortable clothing. Your therapist will discuss your goals and create a personalized treatment plan.

faqs.question: Do you accept insurance?
faqs.answer: We're an out-of-network provider, but we can provide superbills for insurance reimbursement. Many clients get 50-80% reimbursed. We also offer package discounts for self-pay clients.

faqs.question: Do you offer gift cards?
faqs.answer: Yes! Gift cards are available in any amount and make a wonderful present. You can purchase them online or in-person. They never expire.

faqs.question: What safety measures do you have in place?
faqs.answer: We maintain high cleanliness standards with sanitization between each appointment. Air purifiers run continuously, and our staff follows strict hygiene protocols.
